results.title: Adjuvant statin therapy for oesophageal adenocarcinoma: the STAT-ROC feasibility study
results.text_hl: Mean(s.d.) age was 62 7(12 3) years in the placebo group and 66 6(8 7) years in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group. Thirteen participants in the placebo group and 12 in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group were @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@.
